column4: I would assume that the 686 uses instructions which the 386 one doesn't.  you might notice a performance gain
i'm contemplating using the mplayer codecs instead.
I downloaded the mplayer codecs, but I don't know how to get mplayer to use them
hmm. can't help you with that i'm afraid.  i use the underrated totem :-)
i've tried others but always come back to xpdf though
that's nautilus launching the default media player: totem
so I guess I either want to turn off the pretty graphics in totem (can I?) or change the default media player for mp3 files in nautilus (can I?)
eidt->prefs in totem.  or right-click->properties->open-with in nautilus.
click on the radio button for the desired default.
I've turned off the graphics in totem, but the gui is still huge - there's just a big grey area where the graphics used to be.  can't you get rid of that bit altogether?
afaik no.  it's more of a movie player after all.   try a dedicated music player like beep-media-player
I can't see how to get nautilus to change its default - but thoreauputic is helping me with this.
